mapper.select: SELECT CCM.CUST_NO AS custNo , CCM.CUST_NM AS custNm , CASE CCM.SEX WHEN 'M' THEN '남자' WHEN 'F' THEN '여자' END AS sex , CCM.REG_DTM AS regDtm , (SELECT CONCAT(SUBSTRING(CTACT_INF,1,3) , '-' , SUBSTRING(CTACT_INF,4,4) , '-' , SUBSTRING(CTACT_INF,8,4)) FROM BELALOG.CU_CUST_CTACT WHERE CUST_NO = CCM.CUST_NO AND CTACT_GBCD = '10') AS telNo , (SELECT CTACT_INF FROM BELALOG.CU_CUST_CTACT WHERE CUST_NO = CCM.CUST_NO AND CTACT_GBCD = '20') AS emailAdr , (SELECT STAFF_NM FROM BELALOG.CM_STAFF_MST WHERE STAFF_ID = CCM.MGMT_STAFF_ID) AS mgmtStaffNm , (SELECT REG_DTM FROM BELALOG.OD_ORD_MST WHERE CUST_NO = CCM.CUST_NO AND ORD_STAT_GBCD = '30' ORDER BY REG_DTM DESC LIMIT 1) AS lastVsitDtm , (SELECT CONCAT(MAX(CASE ORD_DTL_GBCD WHEN '10' THEN '커트' ELSE 'X' END) , ', ' , MAX(CASE ORD_DTL_GBCD WHEN '20' THEN '펌' ELSE 'X' END) , ', ' , MAX(CASE ORD_DTL_GBCD WHEN '30' THEN '염색' ELSE 'X' END) , ', ' , MAX(CASE ORD_DTL_GBCD WHEN '40' THEN '매직' ELSE 'X' END) , ', ' , MAX(CASE ORD_DTL_GBCD WHEN '50' THEN '클리닉' ELSE 'X' END)) FROM BELALOG.OD_ORD_DTL WHERE CUST_NO = CCM.CUST_NO GROUP BY ORD_NO) AS last_ord_dtl , CCM.RMRK_1 AS rmrk1 FROM BELALOG.CU_CUST_MST CCM WHERE CCM.CUST_NM = #{custNm}
